shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=// -------------------------------- Beat Detective v0.07 ----------------------------------
per_frame_2=sure=if(equal(sure,0),.6,sure);
per_frame_3=interval=if(equal(interval,0),40,interval);
per_frame_4=lastbeat=if(equal(lastbeat,0),frame-FPS,lastbeat);
per_frame_5=dbass=(bass-pbass)/FPS;
per_frame_6=beat=above(dbass,.6*maxdbass)*above(frame-lastbeat,FPS/3);
per_frame_7=sure=if(beat*below(abs(frame-(interval+lastbeat)),FPS/5),
per_frame_8=min(.095+sure,1),beat*(sure-.095)+(1-beat)*sure*.9996);
per_frame_9=sure=max(.5,sure);
per_frame_10=cheat=if(above(frame,lastbeat+interval+ int(FPS/10))*above(sure,.91),1,cheat);
per_frame_11=beat=if(cheat,1,beat);
per_frame_12=sure=if(cheat,.95*sure,sure);
per_frame_13=maxdbass=max(maxdbass*.999,dbass);
per_frame_14=maxdbass=max(.012,maxdbass);
per_frame_15=maxdbass=min(.02,maxdbass);
per_frame_16=interval=if(beat, frame-lastbeat,interval);
per_frame_17=lastbeat=if(beat,frame-cheat*int(FPS/10),lastbeat);
per_frame_18=cheat=0;
per_frame_19=pbass=bass;
per_frame_20=// ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=c=int(rand(2));
per_frame_23=dt=1/FPS;
per_frame_24=phi=if( beat, phi+1.5707*c, phi+dt );
per_frame_25=theta=if( beat, theta + 1.5707*int(rand(2)), theta+dt );
per_frame_26=rho=if( beat, rho+1.5707*(1-c), rho );
per_frame_27=
per_frame_28=q1=phi;
per_frame_29=q2=theta;
per_frame_30=q3=rho;
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=ax=0; ay=0; az=-30;
per_frame_33=bx = ax;
per_frame_34=by = ay*cos(q1) - az*sin(q1);
per_frame_35=bz = ay*sin(q1) + az*cos(q1);
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=ax = bx*cos(q2) - bz*sin(q2);
per_frame_38=ay = by;
per_frame_39=az = bx*sin(q2) + bz*cos(q2);
per_frame_40=
per_frame_41=bx = ax*cos(q3) - ay*sin(q3);
per_frame_42=by = ax*sin(q3) + ay*cos(q3);
per_frame_43=bz = az;
per_frame_44=vx=bx; vy=by; vz=bz;
per_frame_45=
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=contVol = min( (1-.3*dt)*contVol+.3*dt*(bass+mid+treb)*.3333, 1);
per_frame_48=decay=.975;
per_frame_49=zoom=1.005+.03*contVol;
per_frame_50=
per_frame_51=dx=.0016*(-1+2*int(rand(1000))*.001);
per_frame_52=dy=.0016*(-1+2*int(rand(1000))*.001);
per_frame_53=brighten=frame%2;
per_frame_54=
per_frame_55=monitor=contVol;
per_frame_56=
per_frame_57=ob_size=1;ob_a=.015;
per_frame_58=
per_frame_59=hue=.33*time; // change this
per_frame_60=h=6*(hue-int(hue));
per_frame_61=sw1=below(h,1); sw2=(1-sw1)*below(h,2); sw3=(1-sw1)*(1-sw2)*below(h,3); sw4=(1-sw1)*(1-sw2)*(1-sw3)*below(h,4);
per_frame_62=sw6=above(h,5); sw5=(1-sw1)*(1-sw2)*(1-sw3)*(1-sw4)*(1-sw6);
per_frame_63=ob_r=sw1+sw2*(2-h)+sw5*(h-4)+sw6;
per_frame_64=ob_g=sw1*h+sw2+sw3+sw4*(4-h);
per_frame_65=ob_b=sw3*(h-2)+sw4+sw5+sw6*(6-h);
per_frame_66=
per_frame_67=q8=min( (frame-lastbeat)/interval,1);
per_frame_68=q8=if(equal(q8,1),0,q8);
per_frame_69=darken=above(q8,0)*(frame%2);
per_frame_70=brighten=1-darken;
per_pixel_1=ring=20*rad;
per_pixel_2=rot=.15*sin(10*6.2831*ring+2.439+3.1415*cos(3.65*time+.943))*above(rad,.65);
per_pixel_3=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`uv = lerp(uv_orig,uv,0.3);
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float2 d = texsize.zw * 3;
warp_6=`float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_7=`float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
warp_8=`
warp_9=`uv += float2(lum(dx),lum(dy))*texsize.zw*9;
warp_10=`ret = tex2d(sampler_fc_main, uv) - 0.01;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw;
comp_4=`    float3 dx = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_5=`    float3 dy = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_6=`float2 dz = float2(dx.y,dy.y)*2;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`d = texsize.zw*2;
comp_9=`dx = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) )*0.5;
comp_10=`dy = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) )*0.5;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`dz +=float2(dx.y,dy.y);
comp_13=`
comp_14=`float3 bg = pow(length(dz)*0.8+0,0.7)*2 + GetBlur1(uv).y*2;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret = bg*float3(0.2,0.3,0.6);
comp_17=`float2 uv_swimmer =frac(0.5 + (uv-0.5)+float2(q19,q20)*float2(-1,1));
comp_18=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(3,2,1),GetBlur3(uv_swimmer -float2(dx.y,dy.y)).x);
comp_19=`ret = lerp(ret,0,GetBlur2(uv_swimmer-dz).x);
comp_20=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(0,0,0),0.75*GetPixel(uv_swimmer).x);
comp_21=`ret = lerp(ret,0,GetBlur1(uv).z*4);
comp_22=`ret = lerp(ret,2,GetPixel(uv).z);
comp_23=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_24=`}
